bill.title: Tax information; authorize University Research Center to examine if necessary to perform certain research and analyses.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Sections 27-3-73, 27-7-83, 27-13-57 And 27-65-81, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That The Director Of The University Research Center, Or His Designee, Upon Execution Of A Confidentiality Agreement With The Department Of Revenue, Shall Be Authorized To Discuss And Examine Certain Tax Information At The Offices Of The Mississippi Department Of Revenue; To Provide That This Disclosure Is Limited To Information Necessary For The University Research Center, As Part Of Its Duties, To Perform Research And Analyses Related To State Revenue Forecasting, Tax Incentives Authorized By Law And Economic Development Incentives Authorized By Law; To Provide That The Same Prohibitions Against Disclosure Which Apply To The Department Of Revenue Shall Apply To The Director Of The University Research Center, Or His Designee; And For Related Purposes.
